column1: Lead-based paint - For houses built before 1978, tenants are entitled to information about lead-paint composition.
Managers and Agents - Kentucky landlords must provide tenants with the names and addresses of the owner, agents, managers of the property, and any agents that work on their behalf.
Security deposit bank account number - Landlords are legally required to disclose the banking institution and account number that holds the tenantâ€™s security deposit.
